statements: SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT symbol, historical_volatility FROM risk_factors WHERE trading_losses > 1000;
SELECT id, trading_losses FROM risk_factors ORDER BY historical_volatility DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE historical_volatility BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.5;
SELECT symbol, trading_losses FROM risk_factors WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%';
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, trading_losses FROM risk_factors WHERE historical_volatility > 0.5 ORDER BY trading_losses DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, historical_volatility, trading_losses FROM risk_factors WHERE trading_losses BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY historical_volatility ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE historical_volatility >= 0.3 AND trading_losses < 2000;
SELECT symbol, trading_losses FROM risk_factors WHERE historical_volatility < 0.2 AND trading_losses > 500 ORDER BY symbol ASC, trading_losses DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_volatility_data;
SELECT symbol, volatility, date FROM historical_volatility_data ORDER BY volatility DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_losses WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, SUM(loss_amount) AS total_loss FROM trading_losses GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, AVG(volatility) AS avg_volatility FROM historical_volatility_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(volatility) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(volatility) AS average_volatility FROM historical_volatility_data;
SELECT symbol, SUM(loss_amount) AS total_loss FROM trading_losses GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_loss > 10000;
SELECT * FROM trading_losses WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY loss_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalVolatilityData WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT date, volatility FROM HistoricalVolatilityData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(volatility) AS avg_volatility FROM HistoricalVolatilityData GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE factor_name='Interest Rate';
SELECT symbol, factor_description FROM RiskFactors ORDER BY symbol ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalVolatilityData WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT symbol, volatility FROM HistoricalVolatilityData ORDER BY volatility DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(volatility) AS avg_volatility FROM HistoricalVolatilityData GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT symbol, factor_name, factor_description FROM RiskFactors WHERE symbol='GOOGL';
SELECT date, SUM(loss_amount) AS total_loss FROM TradingLosses GROUP BY date HAVING total_loss > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_volatility_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, annualized_volatility FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE daily_volatility > 0.05;
SELECT id, symbol, date FROM trading_losses WHERE loss_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT symbol, factor_name, factor_value FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_value < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM risk_evaluations WHERE risk_level = 'High Risk' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_volatility_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, daily_volatility FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE daily_volatility > 0.5 ORDER BY symbol ASC
SELECT symbol, annualized_volatility FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY annualized_volatility DESC
SELECT symbol, date, loss_amount, reason FROM trading_losses WHERE reason ILIKE '%error%' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT symbol, factor_name, factor_value FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name IN ('Beta','Volatility') ORDER BY factor_value DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_volatility_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, volatility FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.05;
SELECT date, symbol, loss_amount FROM trading_losses WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM market_data;
SELECT date, symbol, risk_score FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score >= 0.8;
SELECT * FROM historical_volatility_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, volatility FROM historical_volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.5 ORDER BY volatility DESC;
SELECT date, symbol, loss_amount FROM trading_losses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY loss_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT factor_name, AVG(factor_value) AS avg_value FROM risk_factors GROUP BY factor_name HAVING AVG(factor_value) > 0.7 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;

SELECT date, symbol, price, risk_score FROM market_data INNER JOIN risk_analysis ON market_data.date = risk_analysis.date AND market_data.symbol = risk_analysis.symbol WHERE price > 100 AND risk_score < 0.4 ORDER BY date ASC, price DESC;
